title: Login issue
body:
I am having login issue.
I am getting "did not recieve response from server" on my end after i put in correct username and password.

Please help??

replies.body:
Hey Mukhosh!

If you are consistently getting a connection error about not receiving a response from the server, then it doesn't appear to be an issue with having the correct Username or Password entered.  If you consistently get this error every time you try to login, try the steps in this guide:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues

There are quite a number of different steps in this guide, but every step is crucial in that it may resolve this issue and get you to the wonderful main page of the client!  If you are still staring at this maddeningly evil error message, even after completing these steps, make sure to [submit a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)to our Tech Team!  They can help look into it further and provide some additional solutions!  If you do submit a ticket, make sure to include the following logs:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
It's not his fault. It is Riot's fault. Stop treating the community like trash.
He's not the only one having issues. I can log into LAN fine but not onto NA. This is the second time this week.
Same deal for me. Was able to log in perfectly fine yesterday. I think when I got home today, there was a patch of some kind.

Tried restarting earlier but it did not fix it. For some reason, it was fixed after following the steps in this thread : http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/LpIqNmo4-after-downtime-and-patch-patcher-window-is-wrong-size. 
Used the fix there because I had the dpi issue also but yesterday the dpi issue was not keeping me from logging into league. The fix required me to log out of windows to apply it. Re-logged into WIndows, launched league and it worked.
